Key Match Events: Russell Westbrook's viral putback rebound after DeAndre Jordan missed a free throw, securing the ball for the Nuggets
Post-Match Reflections: Russell Westbrook reflected on the viral moment, stating he told Ivica Zubac he would get the rebound and that he did, emphasizing his determination when facing former teams
Others: The Nuggets tied the season series with the Clippers after the game, ending a two-game losing streak against them
